snippet: Key individuals who responded to the crippling of a construction crane in Manhattan in Hurricane Sandy’s winds described the nearly week of efforts to secure the crane’s dangling boom.
abstract: Key individuals who responded to the crippling of a construction crane in Manhattan in Hurricane Sandy’s winds describe the efforts to secure the crane’s dangling boom; story of what happened at 157 West 57th Street suggests how close the city was to a catastrophe at the site.
lead_paragraph: Key individuals who responded to the crippling of a construction crane in Manhattan in Hurricane Sandy’s winds described the nearly week of efforts to secure the crane’s dangling boom.

headline.seo: Drama Behind Securing Crippled Crane in Manhattan
headline.main: As Crane Hung in the Sky, a Drama Unfolded to Prevent a Catastrophe Below
headline.print_headline: As Crane Hung in the Sky, a Drama Unfolded to Prevent a Catastrophe Below
